page.title: 16Breedon Primary School
page.content: In 1985 Breedon Primary School had 60 pupils in addendance and 3 teaching members of staff and a nursery nurse. The age of entry of the children is 4+ thus necessitating the aid of the nursery nurse. The Headteacher is a class teacher and Warden of the Community Center. This is because the school is also a community center for the use of the people of Breedon for recreational and social purposes. The school aims to equip the children with the academic standards, social awarenesses and recreational skills to enable them to progress and enjoy the society of 1985. The children leave the school at the age of 10. They,mostly, then go on to the High School at Castle Donington which is in a village 5 miles away.
